description: A dashboard to use to debug a running varnish instance. Easily track requests, cache hits, network i/o, sessions, threads, bans, ban lurker and the ban list size

targets.expr: ((sum(varnish_accg_client_resp_bodybytes{key="GET", namespace="lucid"}) + sum(varnish_accg_client_resp_hdrbytes{key="GET", namespace="lucid"})) - (sum(varnish_accg_backend_resp_bodybytes{key="GET", namespace="lucid"}) + sum(varnish_accg_backend_resp_hdrbytes{key="GET", namespace="lucid"}))) / ((sum(varnish_accg_client_resp_bodybytes{key="GET", namespace="lucid"}) + sum(varnish_accg_client_resp_hdrbytes{key="GET", namespace="lucid"})))

panels.title: Cloud to Site Cache  Transfer Rate

targets.legendFormat: Transfer Rate from the Site Cache
